query: Please help me create a travel plan. I will be traveling solo for a period of 7 days, from March 3rd, 2022, to March 9th, 2022. The journey will start from Phoenix and aim to visit 3 cities in Michigan. My budget for this trip is $6,500.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Traverse City,Alpena,Detroit]
